issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Picker is unable to focus on disabled option and keeps on flickering.

This is not regression since the issue occurs in 3.0.0 GA as well.
This behaviour is observed in iPhone5 only and not in iPhone3GS.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Launch Kitchensink app.
2. Go to Controls > picker > Countdown picker.
3. In the picker, select 0hours 1 min.
4. press start. 
5. Observe the picker.

Actual:
The picker constantly changes its value from 0 to 1 even if it's there only.

Expected:
No need to show this behavior.
fields.summary: IOS: Kitchensink - Picker is unable to focus on disabled option and keeps on flickering

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
